p: Furthermore, some of the common skin disorders such as acne, wound repair, or aging, were also shown to benefit from the antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, and antioxidative properties of OEO. The inhibition of hyaluronidase, collagenase, and elastase are correlated especially to the carvacrol content, while the antimelanin effect by tyrosinase inhibition was observed for linalool-rich essential oil type.
